title: RVT
explain:
CT300-E UAV TT&C and Information Transmission System

The CT300-E is a L-band UAV TT&C (Telemetry, Telecontrol and Communication) and information transmission system and designed to complete telecontrol/telemetry information and payload reconnaissance image transmission of UAV system，and operation/control of UAV as well.

Functions

  • Information transmission
    • Real-time transmission of uplink telecontrol information
    • Real-time transmission of downlink telemetry and reconnaissance information
    • Encryption/de-encryption of uplink/ downlink information
  • Positioning
    • Tracking angle-measurement of UAV
    • Ranging of UAV
    • The position of UAV could be resolved after angle-measurement and ranging
  • Control
    • Planning and control of flight missions and display of flight path and status
    • Payload control and reconnaissance information processing and display
    • Data record and playback
Specifications
Operational distance30km~200km（LOS）
Operational bandL-band
Uplink telecontrol code rate6.4 kbps /12.8kbps
Downlink compound code rate2Mbps/4Mbps
Weight of Air-borne equipment≤4kg
Power consumption of Air-borne equipment15W/DC+24V
120W/DC+28V
Tracking angle-measurement accuracy≤20mrad（RMS）(100km)
≤10mrad（RMS）（200km）
Ranging accuracy≤50m（RMS）

Vehicular Telemetry &Telecontrol Station for UAV

The vehicular telemetry &telecontrol station, as an important part of UAV flight platform system, can implement the telemetry, tracking & location and reconnaissance information transmission of flight platform, and realize remote control of flight platform/airborne mission equipment and real-time monitoring, record and processing of reconnaissance information.

Main Functions

  • Real-time telecontrol and telemetry of flight status of air platform and operating status of airborne mission equipment
  • Real-time of flight status of air platform and operating status of airborne mission equipment
  • Integrative processing, displaying, and recording of flight tracks and telemetry parameters of air platform
  • Task planning and link monitoring capability

Features

  • Telecontrol, telemetry, location and reconnaissance information transmission are integrated into an
    universal carrier channel
  • Uplink telecontrol command is transmitted via encryption and DSSS anti-jamming
  • The reconnaissance image transmission is transmitted after digital compression
  • UAV-borne payload equipment has mini size modular structure, small in dimension, light in weight and
    with low power consumption
  • Reliable digital de-spread and demodulation terminals
  • The ground equipment direct receive downlink wideband data and realize the tracking location
  • Ground equipment has complete function, compact structure, high maneuverability and is convenient
    for operation

Man-pack Remote Video Terminal

Man-pack Remote Video Terminal (RVT), acting as an optional and auxiliary ground equipment of UAV telemetry and telecontrol (TT&C) information transmission system, is used for receiving reconnaissance image from single UAV.
cont:
Main Functions

  • Receiving and displaying image from single UAV
  • Receiving and displaying telemetry parameters and flight path for single UAV
  • Data record and playback
Main Specifications
Operation frequencyL-band
Max Operation Distance50km
Antenna TypeOmni-directional antenna
Continuous Operational Time of Information Processing Computer4hours
Continuous Operational Time of Receiving Combination8hours
Power SupplyAccumulator
Total Weight7.5kg
Operating Temperature－20℃～+55℃
features:
Portable Remote Video Terminal

Remote Video Terminal (RVT) is mainly used for receiving telemetry and high-rate reconnaissance data for C-band downlink signal from single UAV within LOS range. And the main functions include receiving, processing and display of reconnaissance data, display of flight path, etc.

Main Functions

  • Receiving of telemetry data from single UAV
  • Receiving , displaying and recording reconnaissance data from single UAV
  • Displaying and recording telemetry parameter and flight path for single UAV
Main Specifications
Max Operation Distance50km
Antenna OperationAzimuth: automatic, manual, digital guidance
Elevation: mechanical manual
Antenna Coverage RangeAzimuth: ±360° continuous
Elevation: -3°～+65°
Transmission Rate2.048Mbps, 4.096Mbps, 8.192Mbps optional
Transmission BER≤10-5
Environmental TemperatureOperation temperature: －20℃～+55℃
Storage temperature: －40℃～+65℃

Equipment Composition

Portable RVT is portable receiving station, which can be backpacked by two soldiers, when antenna can be mounted on portable tripod, and ruggedized pad is used for information processing. Battery and charger is configured when battery is charged before mission and charger is not carried during mission.

Portable RVT

Interface

External interface is not available during mission. After mission, recorded telemetry and mission data can be outputted through the network port of the pad

Power Supply

Battery power supply is configured for receiving equipment, when self-equipped battery is configured for information processing pad.

Portability

Total weight of equipment is 25 kg. And the equipment can be carried by two soldiers, when one carries antenna and tripod, and the other carries receiving equipment, pad and battery, shown as following photos:
